There evidence presence sleep problem immune response . Several study claim physical exercise effective treatment disease improve quality life , cardiorespiratory function , physical functioning symptom fatigue although always find significant difference intervention group exercise compare control group . Although result study promise , generally present methodological bias small sample size , absence masking , heterogeneous group , lack monitor short long term especially lack specificity relation prescribe exercise ( frequency , intensity , time type exercise ) . Subjects method : A randomized clinical trial , examiner blind unaware intervention group subject assign . Participants randomly assign two group : An experimental group , participant treat Therapeutic Exercise ; And group do Physical Exercise accord preference . All participant must understand sign freely Informed Consent . Sample size : 45 woman group . Data Analysis : A descriptive analysis variable perform . It establish case confidence level 95 % ( p < 0.05 ) . The effectiveness assess comparing experienced change two group outcome variable physical therapy examination .
